categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Michael Vivian Fyfe Pennington (born June 7, 1943) is a British actor, director and writer who played Moff Tiaan Jerjerrod in Return of the Jedi. One of his filmed scenes for the film would end up being reused for the Special Edition of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
